name: Armored Core: Project Phantasma
description:
Armored Core: Project Phantasma is a 1997 video game for the Sony PlayStation. It is part of the Armored Core series. The storyline follows the original Armored Core. The game was not released in Europe.
How does your best AC creation stack up? Find out when you challenge 49 of the deadliest ravens around. 13 different arenas let you choose where the battles take place. New parts expand the variety of AC combinations. Transform saved data from the first game to further increase your AC's destructive potential. Experience intense 2-player AC combat in split screen mode by by using a link cable. Blast your way though 17brand new missions. Beef up your AC using the credits and parts gained from completing missions.
